message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000.  It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right buyer.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $13000.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500.  This would still give you a good deal on a product that you value at $15000. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
